common

Class Instructions

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.Instructions

  • public class Instructions
extends java.lang.Object
    Skeleton class to hold datatypes needed for final project Simply all public variables so can be accessed with 
     Instructions t = new Instructions();
 int fx = t.fx;
    and so on... Also the role is an enum, converted from the char transmitted. (It should never be Role.NULL)
